titleStmt.title: A lesson of self-deniall, or, The true way to desirable beauty by John Collings ...
titleStmt.author: Collinges, John, 1623-1690.
Collinges, John, 1623-1690. Five lessons for a Christian to learne.

notesStmt.note: Has special t.p. with imprint: Printed for Rich. Tomlins, 1649.
This item appears at reel 377:12e as the fourth part of Wing C5317 (Five lessons) and separately at reel 1306:2.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
